website_summaries.verdict: Despite its finicky controls, the Plantronics Discovery 975 is a stylish headset with a comfortable fit, a great feature set, and excellent call quality.
pros: The Plantronics Discovery 975 is a unique Bluetooth headset that features multipoint, voice prompts, and fantastic audio quality with good noise-canceling and wind-noise resistance
It has a much improved charging case with a battery status indicator
cons: The Plantronics Discovery 975 has a hard-to-press multifunction button and the volume key is tiny

customer_reviews.title: nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: I probalby rate this with 5 stars. The noise reduction is so so. However, even Plantronics most expensive model doesn't do a great job of noise reduction. the noise reduction either cancels out all sound or allows to much sound in. It was snug in my ear. I only had to be careful if something brushed up against my ear. The one problem for me is that I forget it is there and may not notice if it falls out. So, I moved to the headset with a round the ear type of unit.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Go

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the entire headset with the charging case, but It was my fault that I did not read the description well enough. There was one with the charging case for about $5 more and I must have ordered the wrong one. Oh well i just happen to have an extra charging case from the 975 that I lost earlier. It was not packed very well at all when shipped to me, and I was surprised that it was not damaged by the other stuff rolling around in the box. But this is a great headset and it takes a licken and keeps on ticken. Great headset! Poor Packing.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Zabka

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Replacement Discovery 975 Head
customer_reviews.text: The Plantronics Replacement Discovery 975 Head works very well. I have had three. The first one still works but the case stopped charging. I had a custom ear mold made for the second and needed to remove the mold each time I wanted to charge it. I eventually broke it. My third one works well using the second charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hill

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes it
customer_reviews.text: I think the original 925 is easier to use but this is for husband and he likes it. It doesn't come w/ case and the 925 case won't fit it. Husband doesn't need case and we recharge w/ old 925 charger which the 925 went threw the wash which is why I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: DI

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset!
customer_reviews.text: The recharging case is good for about 2.5 charges and the LCD indicators on the case are an improvement over the 925! Also, as much as I liked the 925, the smaller button on the side eliminates those unwanted "pocket dials" with the redial last dialed number feature of pressing the button twice quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DFW Professional

customer_reviews.title: Really bad reception. It works with the phone in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really bad reception. It works with the phone in my hand, but I don't have any reception if I put the phone in my pocket. I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only ear piece my boss likes & Amazon carried at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: liked
customer_reviews.text: it works very well , keeps me /or my attention on the road with both hands on the wheel. thanks R
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Ehrman

customer_reviews.title: Form follows function
customer_reviews.text: I have lost and worn out three Discovery 975 Bluetooth headset. It delivers great sound at both ends and you forget it is in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Bud M

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small
customer_reviews.text: It is small and works good, but I keep losing it. The price is also very good. This is the third one I have bought
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Malone

customer_reviews.title: Good earbud
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, it's not so hot w my iPhone 5 I just traded my 3GS for the 5 & the connection is so bad! Short range too
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: new one was great. the refurbished one I received two weeks prior ...
customer_reviews.text: new one was great. the refurbished one I received two weeks prior to that was full of static and therefore unuseable. Always order new ones.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Discovery 975 Head
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, reliable, sound is great because I am hard of hearing without it because of hearing loss. Would recoment it to anyone that has high pitch hearing problems and has to continually turn up the television or other electronich.
customer_reviews.author: Redbone

customer_reviews.title: It can't work
customer_reviews.text: My order is a new, but it's been used, and it can't work.I have already paid for a new .
customer_reviews.author: Juanniao

customer_reviews.title: Would not pair with my Galaxy S 2 !
customer_reviews.text: I tried to pair the earpiece with my new phone that I bought and couldn't conect the two. Up until then I swore by the 975 plantronics, but now I have a different opinion and I haven't even recieved a replacement for the defective earpiece !
customer_reviews.author: bigkev

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product was excellent. I used it twice. But when Hurricane Sandy came, my car was flooded and destroyed along with the blue tooth much to my great regret. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Harry B

customer_reviews.title: stopped working quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for one I had. When it works, I really like it, but it is not resilient. Seems like I would have to buy a new one every month when they stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stewart

customer_reviews.title: item is not new
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived badly packed and not new. Its false advertising! Wouldn't recommend to anyone, bad business practice. I bought this to replace my aging piece, but this "new" piece was even older than my current.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Y.

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Replacement is not "new"
customer_reviews.text: Product indicated to be new ... it is not ... the cosmetics of the item shows extreme wear and tear, it can't be "new" ...
customer_reviews.author: Ghitta W. Torrico

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: product is poor quality. Doesn't hold a charge very long. Same issues that I had with my old one that was over one year old. I feel like I bought a used product.
customer_reviews.author: Valley

customer_reviews.title: Most Convenient Bluetooth, Lacks Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my Bluetooth headset after my puppy decided to snack on my original. After researching all of the available headsets, I decided that I had been so happy with the ability to store this one in the charger for an always at-the-ready headset, I should just replace it with the exact same one. The ear insert isn't the most comfortable with its square design but the sound quality and battery life make up for the flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth device is the best I've ever owned. I had to buy a replacement when I accidentally dropped my original one in water. I was astonished at the speed at which mine was delivered. If there is better device than the 975, I don't know what it is. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Outstanding product. Everyone I know wants me to tell them where I got mine for such a steal. You can't go wrong. It's guaranteed by Amazon. Clear calls. Easy Bluetooth link up. Really it's the best you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gunn

customer_reviews.title: The only Bluetooth headset that has ever worked for me reliably.
customer_reviews.text: Stays put in my ear for hours at a time with out discomfort. No one has ever complained about not hearing me on the call (except in extreme environments). I try to treat it gently but the summation of a lot of small accidents have done nothing but chip the exterior paint away. Now that it is getting older I am noticing the battery life starting to trail off slowly. I cannot fault the device for what is inherent in the world of battery technology.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because it is easy to fit my ears
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it is easy to fit my ears, because there so small. but I can't not get it to work, and this one is my 4th one. for some reason it won't link up with my phone. maybe a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product, consistently great sound
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with these headsets is my ability to loose them. I am now hooking them to a lanyard; I cannot keep it in my ear all day long. If someone would invent a way to keep these from breaking loose it would be great. I have used the Plantronics lanyard, it hooks to the USB port, but lost 2 on that thing. I just don't think it's cool to keep it in my ear all the time. Otherwise best bluetooth I have ever had; too bad I have had 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D

customer_reviews.title: Completely love this earpiece BT device
customer_reviews.text: Completely love this earpiece BT device. It's light & compact and so is its charger. Long lasting battery by itself. Add the carrier to your travel trips and you just extended your use by a day or two without charging it using an outlet. Easy to sync to any phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty won

customer_reviews.title: Best headset device
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset I have ever owned. Clear, loud and easy to pair. Makes it a breeze to talk using my IPhone 5 and has long battery life. Liked so much I bought one for my husband,who is very picky about his electronics, and he likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: not good.
customer_reviews.text: second hand. very little time on charge. wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DURE N ABRO

customer_reviews.title: plantroncs
customer_reviews.text: I love this company and their Bluetooth devices. I have owned 3 others and they all were fantastic. I wore one of them out probably cause it lasted at least 4years. So when it stopped working I couldn't complain. The others I lost and was mad at myself.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Broadway

customer_reviews.title: broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I was premised that the product was new but when It arrived I noticed that it had scratches and that is actually how I discovered that it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Teodorita

customer_reviews.title: Better than any of others I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time buying one of these. They work well, they are comfortable, I just wish they were harder to lose!
customer_reviews.author: Liba

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: Received it, charged it , didn't work. Returned and disappointed. Love this unit and will repurchase with another vendor. 111
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many hands free devices and this is the best by far. It's light, sounds good and works like it is suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Roy W.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Discovery 975
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the full kit with the carry case and battery. I was pleased to find the Bluetooth only at a fairly reasonable price, and it works great. I'd only suggest that it be shipped with a set of the plastic ear cushions, as this would typically need replacing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Freedman

customer_reviews.title: move on
customer_reviews.text: i had this head set previously ordered to replace lost unit worked for a bit but has alredy stoped working
customer_reviews.author: rukkus

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This BT headset is really great. It just works. It automatically connects to the phone, there are no troubles. Unfortunately I've lost the old one so I had to buy the replacement headset.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after four weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Original headset worked fine for two years until I lost it. This replacement will no longer take a charge from any source..
customer_reviews.author: patricia jackson

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: not good at all..it falls off the ear all the time. It looks like a big piece of thing sticking out of your ear.
customer_reviews.author: SAC A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hear with, people can understand me when I speak and it holds up well. Best bluetooth ear piece I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grant

customer_reviews.title: Quality?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the Plantronics Discovery 975 I originally purchased so when I lost it, it was a no brainer to simply replace it with the exact same model since I still had the charging case. This one never had good quality sounding calls. People were constantly asking me to repeat myself or saying that they couldn't hear me. It always had a sort of "crackle" sound in the background. So back to the drawing board, guess I'll have to buy a new one. I never did attempt to contact the seller. so this is a review of the product and not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: royalblu3

product_meta.title: Plantronics Replacement Discovery 975 Head (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Shipping Height: 0.5 Shipping Width: 4.0 Master Pack Qty: 1 General Information Manufacturer: Plantronics, Inc Manufacturer Part Number: 82569-02 Brand Name: Plantronics Product Line: Discovery Product Model: 975 Product Name: Discovery 975 Earset Marketing Information: The ingeniously simple Discovery 975 offers a custom blend of elegance and advanced technologies to keep you connected clearly, comfortably, and easily. A striking, minimalist design offers the simplicity of one-touch controls, while dual-mic AudioIQ and WindSmart technologies keep your conversations clear, even in harsh conditions. Product Type: Earset Technical Information Connectivity Technology: Wireless Wireless Technology: Bluetooth Wireless Operating Distance: 33 ft Sound Mode: Mono Battery Information Battery Standby Time: 168 Hour Maximum Battery Run Time: 5 Hour Earpiece Earpiece Design: Earbud Earpiece Type: Monaural Driver Size: 0.39 Microphone Microphone Technology: Noise Cancelling Integrated Microphone: Yes Physical Characteristics Color: Graphite Form Factor: Open Weight (Approximate): 0.28 oz Miscellaneous Green Compliant: Yes Green Compliance Certificate/Authority: WEEE Green Compliance Certificate/Authority: RoHS Warranty Standard Warranty: 1 Year Limited

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Multipoint technology, Noise cancellation, Wind noise reduction, Active pairing
